attributes.additional_details:
Why does any newspaper need to have topless girls/women in the paper, in this day and age?!

It is undermining to women and the issue of self confidence in girls and women is ever increasing and worsening due to increased pressures to conform.

I want the government to either ban the publication of such things or put increased pressure on newspapers such as The Sun to remove them.

Women need to become just as equal as men and the government has to be seen to lead the way in promoting this.
